name: Garden Gnome: Prune the Weeds
description:
GARDEN GNOME: PRUNE THE WEEDS

The life of a garden gnome is often not particularly interesting. The protagonist of Gargen Gnome: Prune the Weeds is no different. But he has a clear objective, to look after and protect his garden. When the garden is invaded by hordes of monsters, he does not hesitate to arm himself with his axe and go out and get them. The creatures never seem to end, but the gnome does not intend to give up, so he will fight to the end, whatever it takes. 

CONTROLS PC KeyActionDWalkUpParry (Up)DownParry (Down)RightParry (Right)LeftParry (Left)SpacebarAttack SMARTPHONE ScreenActionSlide (Up)Parry (Up)Slide (Down)Parry (Down)Slide (Right)Parry (Right) // WalkSlide (Left)Parry (Left)TouchAttack
